item.title: 1 Error, Help Me Plax
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Alright, here’s the error.

client.java:6864: illegal start of expression public void ReportAbuse(String report, int rule, int mute) ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Now, I know those type of errors when I see them. It means I’ve added something incorrectly above that specific void, boolean w,e. So, here’s what’s above it.

/*Free Quests*/ if(q1stage == -1) { sendQuest("@gre@Invisible Armour", 7332); } if(q1stage >= 1) { sendQuest("@yel@Invisible Armour", 7332); } if(q1stage == 0) { sendQuest("Invisible Armour", 7332); } if(q2stage == -1) { sendQuest("@gre@Cook's Assistant", 7333); } if(q2stage >= 1) { sendQuest("@yel@Cook's Assistant", 7333); } if(q2stage == 0) { sendQuest("Cook's Assistant", 7333); } if(q3stage == -1) { sendQuest("@gre@Spells Of The Gods", 7334); } if(q3stage >= 1) { sendQuest("@yel@Spells Of The Gods", 7334); } if(q3stage == 0) { sendQuest("Spells Of The Gods", 7334); } if(q3stage == -1) { sendQuest("@gre@Legend's Quest", 7334); } if(q7stage >= 1) { sendQuest("@yel@Legend's Quest", 7334); } if(q7stage == 0) { sendQuest("Legend's Quest", 7334); if(q7stage == -1) { sendQuest("@gre@The Story Of Ramen", 7336); } if(q4stage >= 1) { sendQuest("@yel@The Story Of Ramen", 7336); } if(q4stage == 0) { sendQuest("The Story Of Ramen", 7336); }

I was trying to add a quest, if that helps. I’ve tried fixing it for about 30 minutes now, so I’m asking you guys to help.

Thanks.

Read full topic
